name: TVTopShelfCarouselContent
desc: A set of items you present using a carousel-style interface in the top shelf.

items.name: init(style: TVTopShelfCarouselContent.Style, items: [TVTopShelfCarouselItem])
items.desc: Creates a content object for displaying items in a carousel style in the top shelf interface.

items.name: var items: [TVTopShelfCarouselItem]
items.desc: The items to display in the top shelf interface.

items.name: var style: TVTopShelfCarouselContent.Style
items.desc: The appearance to use when displaying items in the top shelf interface.

items.name: enum TVTopShelfCarouselContent.Style
items.desc: Constants indicating how you want items to appear in the top shelf interface.
